channel.title: Manufacturing Facility on FinanClub

item.title: VSH
item.description: score:91 Chances: Vishay Intertechnology reported Q2 earnings that beat estimates, and revenues showed a year-over-year increase. Vishay is expanding its product offerings and capabilities, such as adding new devices and enhancing its opto capabilities. The company has opened a new state-of-the-art resistors manufacturing facility and signed agreements to bundle haptic technology licenses with its products.
